name: Fire Hero: Another Story
description:
Let train the fireman before he can save the others in the game Fire Hero:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fire-hero/id1078541781?mt=8

There are 2 modes in the game :
- Classic Mode (easy mode)
- Rush Mode (hard mode)
- Reach the high score, compete with other players around the world.

Please visit my page http://khangle.me for more information.
